data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Mahdia, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mahdia, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Mahdia. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary: On average, 29 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Mahdia, Tunisia.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, help the 122 believers in Mahdia to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Mahdia, Tunisia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, 0.2% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
God, we pray for the believers in Mahdia, Tunisia to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Mahdia do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Mahdia access to a Bible in their own language.
